quotes.name: BQ
quotes.content:
**Base Quality is based on:**```yml
- Hero Highest level across all 12 vocations.
- Hero Highest revocation number across all 12 vocations
- The level of the last grotto beaten.```**Quality Ranges Between: 2 - 248
Example BQ Calculation:**
```yml
Hero Highest Level: 99
Hero Highest Revocation: +10
(Each Revocation Adds 5 Quality, So 10*5 = 50)
Level of Last Grotto Beaten: 99
99 + 50 + 99 = 248```

quotes.name: Spreadsheet
quotes.content: You can find this information in my [DQIX spreadsheet](<https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/10NEB9Kf_K6S1KAKvqHE-wt6VLY9vvSPeMWMvNKjR0Rg>).

quotes.name: OldSchool
quotes.content:
A lot of information within <#1143509536783736965> are made cleaner than it used to be, however I know it's easier to link the regular archived channels still.
If you'd prefer having access to these old channels, type `?rank OldSchool` in <#692867688325709835>

quotes.name: LegacyLocations
quotes.content:
```yml
Dragonlord - Grotto Greygnarl Drop
Malroth    - Lonely Coast cliff cave; DLC Quest 151
Baramos    - Cringle Coast island cave; Normal Quest 62
Zoma       - Cringle Coast island field; DLC Quest 167
Psaro      - Lv16+ Dragonlord Drop
Estark     - Cringle Coast island house; DLC Quest 152
Nimzo      - Lv16+ Psaro Drop
Murdaw     - Lv16+ Baramos Drop
Mortamor   - Heights of Loneliness cave entrance; DLC Quest 158
Nokturnus  - Lonely Coast cliff cave; DLC Quest 184
Orgodemir  - Urdus Marshland cliff well; DLC Quest 176
Dhoulmagus - Lv16+ Murdaw Drop
Rhapthorne - Wyrmtail cliff cave; DLC Quest 179```
